INSERT INTO sys_office( id, parent_id, parent_ids, area_id, franchisee_id,
district, city, province,
code, name, sort, type, grade, level, address, zip_code, master, phone, fax, email, is_new, is_test, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, longitude, latitude, useable, primary_person, deputy_person, office_code ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{parent.id}, #{parentIds}, #{area.id}, #{franchisee.id},
(SELECT id FROM sys_area WHERE CODE = (SELECT CODE FROM sys_area AS a WHERE a.`id` = #{area.id}) AND TYPE = 4 AND del_flag = 0), (SELECT id FROM sys_area WHERE CODE = LEFT((SELECT CODE FROM sys_area AS a WHERE a.`id` = #{area.id}),9) AND TYPE = 3 AND del_flag = 0), (SELECT id FROM sys_area WHERE CODE = LEFT((SELECT CODE FROM sys_area AS a WHERE a.`id` = #{area.id}),5) AND TYPE = 2 AND del_flag = 0),
#{code}, #{name}, #{sort}, #{type}, #{grade}, (LENGTH( #{parentIds})-LENGTH(REPLACE( #{parentIds},',',''))), #{address}, #{zipCode}, #{master}, #{phone}, #{fax}, #{email}, #{isNew}, #{isTest}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{longitude}, #{latitude}, #{useable}, #{primaryPerson.id}, #{deputyPerson.id}, #{officeCode} )
